text: 11.23: Mt 17.20; Ru 17.6; 1 Ko 13.2Gu guigira nde nzuai, guma the khaŋ kha mbɨkshɨma suanga, ‘Ndu khaŋ thav sigiv, ŋgɨv, wo fegɨ mbasɨk khɨnik,’ mba guma ndɨkndɨga baviran muuŋv, Fhe Bakɨme ŋkasŋka khothɨgɨp, khaŋ suanga, ‘Gu ntige kha nzuai bigeŋ, nan hɨgɨrga,’ ana maaŋ suanga mba bigeŋ guigira anan hɨgɨrga.
